cause.description:
We are trying to unite all G's and MC's that stand for the West Coast and its beliefs.... Open to Bloods, Crips and the GangBangn from across the world....
1. Bring The Unity of Snoop And Diddy
2. Fight the real enemy.... The goverment...
3. Legalise Cannabis
cause.mission: To stand for the West Coast
cause.name: West Coast
